Reviews.Title: Great 14" i5 -
Reviews.Author: Shanon T. Coleman
Reviews.Content: Love it so far -Fast boot up - 14" screen is what I wanted. i5 1st Gen seems faster than expected. Built in Intel HD graphics are average. Not recommended for gameplay but for everyday apps its great. Speakers are below average but speaker jack sound is great which works for me.500 GB HD is 5400 speed. 1.3M camera & Under 5 pounds - Perfect.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as expected
Reviews.Author: dealshopper
Reviews.Content: I received the notebook, in less then two weeks. For a college student, and has not had any problems with it. We have had it for approximatley 1 month now.

Reviews.Title: Bummed
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I just received my Notebook today, which was very quick, but bummed because the webcam hasn't worked at all, "device not found."  Acer is going to fix the problem which is great.  Just not happy that I have to send my "new" notebook (I've had it for one day) for service which will take at least two weeks!

Reviews.Title: Works great for refurbished
Reviews.Author: Gwyn
Reviews.Content: Needed a small but reliable computer and was a little bit worried about buying refurbished, but the price was just too good.  The computer works great.  It has a couple little quirks, for instance,1.it will only accept the password for the administrator login when it first boots up, if it goes to sleep and I wake it up, it no longer recognizes the password. and 2. the clear system/reboot program always opens up upon first login, I've almost accidentally accepted and cleared my computer a couple of times.  Otherwise I've had the computer for over a year and it is still fast and it still looks and works great.  Pretty glad I bought this computer even more than a year later.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-480M ; Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
4GB DDR3 Memory; 500GB Hard Drive
14" HD Screen (1366 x 768)
3 x USB 2.0; 1 x VGA; 1 x HDMI
1.3 Megapixel HD Webcam
ProductInfo.Name: Acer 14" i5-480M 2.66 GHz Laptop | AS4743-6481
